text: GDPR Article 5 - Principles relating to processing of personal data (lawfulness, fairness, transparency, purpose limitation, data minimization, accuracy, integrity and confidentiality).
GDPR Article 7 - Conditions for consent (freely given, specific, informed, unambiguous affirmative action).
CCPA ยง 1798.100 - General duties of businesses regarding consumer rights and privacy notices.
CPRA ยง 1798.121 - Right to Limit Use of Sensitive Personal Information (analogous to VCDPA's sensitive data protections).
CPA ยง 12-110-102 - Definitions and scope (similar thresholds and consumer rights framework).
